name: Fashion4Home
overview:
Fashion4Home.com is an online retailer focused on delivering high-end designer furniture at 50-70% less than traditional retail prices.

Fashion4Home.com is the first US-based hub for the worldâ€™s best designers to share their ideas and sketches directly with consumers to garner feedback and create new concepts. Fashion4Home.com is committed to providing an intensely rewarding customer experience by delivering the highest quality products at the lowest possible prices.

The company is backed by Holtzbrinck Ventures and Rocket Internet. Fashion4Home, Inc. is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the German company Fashion4Home Gmbh.
